name: Marble Zebra cake
description: Makes 1 8 inch cake pan  Allergy Information: Dairy, egg, corn, soy, yeast free.
recipeIngredient: 7 Tablespoons raw Sugar (scant 1/2 cup. Use 1/2 cup for sweeter)
1 Tablespoon Apple Cider Vinegar or 1 teaspoon vinegar
1/4 cup organic canola oil (or half virgin coconut and half organic canola oil)
1 cup and 1/4 cup soft white whole wheat flour

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, whisk all the wet ingredients, salt and sugar until well combined. (Add flaxmeal to the wet for AP version)
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, whisk all the wet ingredients, salt and sugar until well combined. (Add flaxmeal to the wet for AP version)

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, whisk the flours, baking powder and spices and add to the wet ingredients.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl, whisk the flours, baking powder and spices and add to the wet ingredients.

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk until just about combined into a flowy batter. Use a few teaspoons more water or flour if needed, since the water absorption depends on the flours.
recipeInstructions.name: Whisk until just about combined into a flowy batter. Use a few teaspoons more water or flour if needed, since the water absorption depends on the flours.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer half of the cake mix to another bowl and add cocoa powder to it. Mix till combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer half of the cake mix to another bowl and add cocoa powder to it. Mix till combined.

recipeInstructions.text: The cocoa powder will thicken the batter a little, Add 2-3 teaspoons water to the cocoa batter to get it to the same consistency as the white batter.
recipeInstructions.name: The cocoa powder will thicken the batter a little, Add 2-3 teaspoons water to the cocoa batter to get it to the same consistency as the white batter.

recipeInstructions.text: Take 2 ladles or small bowls of the same size and pour a ladle of the white cake mix onto parchment lined or well greased cake pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Take 2 ladles or small bowls of the same size and pour a ladle of the white cake mix onto parchment lined or well greased cake pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Then pour a ladle of cocoa mix on top of the white mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Then pour a ladle of cocoa mix on top of the white mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Continue till all mix gets used up.
recipeInstructions.name: Continue till all mix gets used up.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in preheated 360 degrees F for 35-40 minutes until toothpick from the center comes out clean.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake in preheated 360 degrees F for 35-40 minutes until toothpick from the center comes out clean.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve as is, or topped with melted chocolate.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve as is, or topped with melted chocolate.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool for a bit before slicing for less crumbly slices.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool for a bit before slicing for less crumbly slices.

keywords: vegan cake, whole wheat flour cake
